titleStmt.title: A new mystery in physick discovered by curing of fevers & agues by quinquina or Jesvites powder translated from the French by Dr. Belon, with additions.
Traité de la guérison des fièvres par le quinquina. English
titleStmt.author: Monginot, François, fl. 1679.

notesStmt.note: "A translation of his Traité de la guérison des fièvres par le quinuina."--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Attributed to Monginot by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
